data.Sentence: --- lesson 15  Fifty pence worth of trouble

data.Sentence_cn: 孩子们总是喜欢得到一些零花钱。
data.Sentence: Children always appreciate small gifts of money.

data.Sentence_cn: 爸爸妈妈当然经常会给孩子零花钱，但是，叔舅婶姨也是孩子们额外收入的来源。
data.Sentence: Mum or dad, of course, provide a regular supply of pocket money, but uncles and aunts are always a source of extra income.

data.Sentence_cn: 对于有些孩子来说，少量的钱可以花很长一段时间。
data.Sentence: With some children, small sums go a long way.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果50便士不拿来换糖吃，则可以放在储蓄罐里叮当响上好几月。
data.Sentence: If fifty pence pieces are not exchanged for sweets, they rattle for months inside money boxes.

data.Sentence_cn: 但是能把储蓄罐装满的只有屈指可数的几个特别节俭的孩子。
data.Sentence: Only very thrifty children manage to fill up a money box.

data.Sentence_cn: 对大部分孩子来说，用50便士来买一大块好的巧克力，是算不了什么的。
data.Sentence: For most of them, fifty pence is a small price to pay for a nice big bar of chocolate.

data.Sentence_cn: 我的外甥乔治有一个储蓄罐，但总是空空的。
data.Sentence: My nephew, George, has a money box but it is always empty.

data.Sentence_cn: 我给了他不少50便士的硬币，但没有几个存到储蓄罐里。
data.Sentence: Very few of the fifty pence pieces and pound coins I have given him have found their way there.

data.Sentence_cn: 昨天，我给了他50便士让他存起来，
data.Sentence: I gave him fifty pence yesterday and advised him to save it.

data.Sentence_cn: 他却拿这钱给自己买了50便士的麻烦。
data.Sentence: Instead he bought himself fifty pence worth of trouble.

data.Sentence_cn: 在他去糖果店的路上，50便士掉在地上，在人行道上跳了几下，掉进了阴沟里。
data.Sentence: On his way to the sweet shop, he dropped his fifty pence and it bounced along the pavement and then disappeared down a drain.

data.Sentence_cn: 乔治脱掉外套，卷起袖子，将右胳膊伸进了阴沟盖。
data.Sentence: George took off his jacket, rolled up his sleeves and pushed his right arm through the drain cover.

data.Sentence_cn: 但他摸了半天也没找到那50便士硬币，他的胳膊反倒退不出来了。
data.Sentence: He could not find his fifty pence piece anywhere, and what is more, he could not get his arm out.

data.Sentence_cn: 这时在他周围围上了许多人，一位女士在乔治胳膊上抹了肥皂、黄油，但乔治的胳膊仍然卡得紧紧的。
data.Sentence: A crowd of people gathered round him and a lady rubbed his arm with soap and butter, but George was firmly stuck.

data.Sentence_cn: 有人打电话叫来消防队，两位消防队员使用了一种特殊的润滑剂才使乔治得以解脱。
data.Sentence: The fire brigade was called and two fire fighters freed George using a special type of grease.

data.Sentence_cn: 不过，此事并没使乔治过于伤心，
data.Sentence: George was not too upset by his experience

data.Sentence_cn: 因为糖果店老板娘听说了他遇到的麻烦后，赏给他一大盒巧克力。
data.Sentence: because the lady who owns the sweet shop heard about his troubles and rewarded him with a large box of chocolates.
